p: Further inhibitory activities of the selected compounds on HBV replication were tested as above on HepG2.2.15 cells. Culture supernatants of each sample were collected on day 5, and analyzed for the viral HBeAg synthesis, using HBeAg/Anti-HBe Elisa Kit (DIASource, Belgium) following the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. All data were presented as % inhibition of HBeAg expression in relation to the untreated control. The experiment was repeated to confirm the reproducibility.
